Ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, 1 teaspoon minced fresh parsley, 1/2 teaspoon minced garlic ,1/4 teaspoon reduced-sodium soy sauce, 1 beef flat iron steak or boneless top sirloin steak (3/4 pound), 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper
Preparation instructions:
Mix 1 tablespoon butter with parsley, garlic and soy sauce.
Sprinkle steak with salt and pepper. In a large skillet, heat remaining butter over medium heat. Add steak; cook until meat reaches desired doneness (for medium-rare, a thermometer should read 135°; medium, 140°; medium-well, 145°), 4-7 minutes per side.
